description:
Given a string S consisting of digits from 1 through 9, determine the number of pairs of integers (i, j) (1 ≤ i ≤ j ≤ |S|) that satisfy the following condition:

`Condition: In base ten, the i-th through j-th characters of S form an integer that is a multiple of 2023.`

```
Constraints:  
1 ≤ |S| ≤ 200000  
S is a string consisting of digits from 1 through 9.  
Sample Input:1  
2232023412023  
Sample Output:1  
4  
Four pairs - (3,5), (7,9), (1,13), and (11,13) - satisfy the condition.

Sample Input:2  
920232032212  
Sample Output:2  
1  
One pair - (2,10) - satisfies the condition.
```
title: Multiple of 2023
